mapper.select: select `rid`,`document_date` as `documentDate`,`receivable_date` as receivableDate,`receivable_money` as `receivableMoney`,`received_money` as `receivedMoney`, `this_receivable` as `thisReceivable`,`unpay_money` as `unpayMoney`,`pay_account` as `payAccount`,dictc.name as `settlementMethod`, `settlement_num` as `settlementNum`,`remarks`,dicts.name as `sourceType`,`source_num` as `sourceNum`,`receipt_id` as `receiptId`,recpitem.`del_flag` as `delFlag` from cus_receipt_item recpitem left join cus_dictionary dicts on recpitem.source_type = dicts.id left join cus_dictionary dictc on recpitem.settlement_method = dictc.id where receipt_id = #{value}
mapper.delete:
delete from cus_receipt_item where rid in
#{rid}
